Source.Name: perl-test-differences
Source.Summary: Test::Differences - Test strings and data structures and show differences if not ok
Source.Description: Test::Differences - Test strings and data structures and show differences if not ok. When the code you're testing returns multiple lines, records or data structures and they're just plain wrong, an equivalent to the Unix diff utility may be just what's needed.

Package.Name: perl-test-differences
